abstract: Merrill Lynch, dropped as an adviser and financier to the Brazilian mining company Vale, has re-emerged in the mining sector as a lender to BHP Billiton, which raised its bid for a rival, Rio Tinto.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch, dropped as an adviser and financier to the Brazilian mining company Vale, has re-emerged in the mining sector as a lender to BHP Billiton, which raised its bid for a rival, Rio Tinto.

headline.main: Merrill Gets In on Another Big Mining Deal
